xmlText.p: First Period_1, Montreal, Froese 2 (Benn, Carr), 8:52. 2, Tampa Bay, Point 25 (Killorn), 12:07. Penalties_Alzner, MTL, Major (fighting), 14:45; Stamkos, TB, served by Erne, (instigator), 14:45; Stamkos, TB, Major (fighting), 14:45; Stamkos, TB, Misconduct (misconduct), 14:45; Gallagher, MTL, (roughing), 19:17; Hedman, TB, (roughing), 19:17.

Second Period_3, Tampa Bay, Kucherov 33 (Johnson, Hedman), 7:32 (pp). 4, Montreal, Morrow 5 (Pacioretty, Hudon), 8:50. 5, Montreal, Pacioretty 17 (Drouin, Petry), 16:29 (pp). Penalties_Hudon, MTL, (tripping), 4:50; Byron, MTL, (interference), 7:01; Kucherov, TB, (hooking), 15:33.

Third Period_6, Tampa Bay, Callahan 4 (Kucherov, Stamkos), 2:11 (pp). Penalties_Froese, MTL, (cross checking), 0:07; Danault, MTL, (slashing), 0:21; Killorn, TB, (hooking), 3:39; Namestnikov, TB, (hooking), 6:17.
Shootout_Tampa Bay 1 (Kunitz NG, Point G), Montreal 0 (Byron NG, Drouin NG, Hudon NG).
Power-play opportunities_Tampa Bay 2 of 5; Montreal 1 of 4.
Goalies_Tampa Bay, Vasilevskiy 36-12-2 (32 shots-29 saves). Montreal, Niemi 3-6-2 (39-36).
Referees_Eric Furlatt, Chris Rooney. Linesmen_Derek Amell, Mark Shewchyk.
